Topping up your GCrypto Trading Wallet means adding funds to your wallet, which you can use to buy cryptocurrency. Ensure you stay within your [GCash Wallet Transaction Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits), and [GCrypto Trading Wallet Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303981320473-What-are-the-transaction-limits-of-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet) to avoid any issues.

### **How to top up your GCrypto Trading Wallet:**

1. On the GCrypto dashboard, tap **Top Up**
2. Enter the amount you wish to top up and tap **Continue**
3. Review your details then tap **Pay**

You'll see a confirmation message once the top-up is successful.

To confirm your GCrypto top-up transactions, check your **GCash App Inbox** and **GCash Transaction History**.
